resources.string: Remember to enable GPS location to start scanning WiFI networks!
"Remember, if you're in Android 6.0+, you need to activate GPS."

"Your device is not rooted.

\"Try PIN (root)\" and \"Show passwords\" are only for rooted devices.

If your device is not rooted, you only can scan AP's and see info about it.

How to root your %2$s

Be a great user! Be a superuser! Be root!"

"Please, press 'Scan' button to scan available networks.
Be sure that WiFi is enabled."

"But… why?
Please, allow access to location (GPS) to scan networks."

"Welcome to Android GPS/Wifi.
To scan WiFi networks using Android 6.0 or above, you must provide location permissions

"We are Trying to Connect. Be Patient!
We hope that it's your Network! Seek Permission before testing"

Remember, you NEED to be ROOT if you are under Kitkat or below.
If you are under Lollipop or upper, you can choose between ROOT and NO ROOT method."
